meta.name: description
meta.content: Gorham School District serves K-12th grade students and is located in Gorham, ME.

img.alt: Monday April 13 Blog Update Thumbnail Image

div.div: ** GMS 3D Printers Being Put To Good Use ** THANK YOU to Ruth's Reusables and UNUM! ** THANK YOU to Jobs for Maine's Graduates (JMG) ** A Few Pictures from One Family's at Home Learning Last Week ** Another Resource from Junior Achievement ** Upcoming School Committee Meetings (Budget Related) ** Upcoming Dunk and Discuss Zoom Meeting ** Thought Exchange Reminder **

img.alt: Friday April 10 BLOG Update Thumbnail Image

div.div: ** Questions about end of year, etc. ** Spring Athletic Seasons Are Canceled...but work is not done ** Grading and Reporting (6-12) ** Upcoming School Committee Meetings (Budget Related) ** Upcoming Dunk and Discuss Zoom Meeting ** A Reminder to Keep Sharing the GOOD! **

div.div: Intro ** Clarification on Attendance ** Narragansett Modular Project ** Operation Feed Gorham ** Opportunity Alliance COVID-19 Infographic ** Gorham Action Team for Youth **

div.div: ** Operation Feed Gorham ** Upcoming Gorham School Committee meetings ** Narragansett Kitchen Item On TOMORROW NIGHT'S Town Council Meeting ** Zoom & Other Video Conference Meetings ** Attendance Starts Today ** Thought Exchange Reminder **

img.alt: Friday April 3 Blog Update Thumbnail Image

div.div: ** Narragansett Kitchen Project BACK On Town Council Agenda ** Changes to Operation Feed Gorham Schedule Effective April 6 ** THANK YOU to Freihofer’s Bakery...We have so much, we are opening up to Public! Here's information on how to access! ** Recent video from GHS students on #separatedbutnotdivided ** Update on Ongoing Conversations Regarding School Calendar for 2019-20 ** Upcoming School Committee Meetings ** Thought Exchange Survey Launched To Help Admin. and Teachers Continue to Find "Balance"... **
